This is perfect! You might be able to finally figure out what these purple suit boat people are up to. You accept the old man's offer.

The man welcomes you behind the counter and tells you to step through the curtain. You step through the curtain. Inside the set-up room is some cooking equipment, and various pink boxes with strange labels. Before you can do anything else, you feel something hard and metal on your head, and you get knocked out.

You try to move. You feel something rough all around you, and you can't see. What is going on? What has happened to you?
